//{{{
Emathbook.sendOfflineCourseContent= function(){

//Fake remove ect...
    if(jQuery('#bookclosedwindow').length > 0){
saveChanges();
            setTimeout(function(){
                jQuery('#bookclosingcontent').hide();
                jQuery('#bookclosecontent').slideDown('slow');
                },2000);

        }
return true;









    if(Emathbook.options.pages[0].courseid !=''){
        // for now only student solutions are sended
        var offlineTiddlers = store.getTaggedTiddlers('offlinesolution');
        var backUpTiddlers = store.getTaggedTiddlers('backupthis');
                var sendList = [];
        for (var i=0;i<offlineTiddlers.length;i++){
            sendList.push({'type':'5','tiddlerName':offlineTiddlers[i].title});
        }
        for (var i=0;i<backUpTiddlers.length;i++){
            if(!backUpTiddlers[i].isTagged('offlinesolution')){
                sendList.push({'type':'5','tiddlerName':backUpTiddlers[i].title});
            }
        }
        if(sendList.length > 0){
            Emathbook.getCourseUpdatesSilent(sendList);
        }else if(jQuery('#bookclosedwindow').length > 0){
            saveChanges();
            setTimeout(function(){
                jQuery('#bookclosingcontent').hide();
                jQuery('#bookclosecontent').slideDown('slow');
                },2000);

        }
    }
} 

Emathbook.sendcourseContent = function(sendData){
    return true;
}

Emathbook.getCourseUpdatesSilent = function(callData){
    var courseId = Emathbook.options.pages[0].courseid;
    var callback = function(data){
        if (response.status == 200){
            var serverTime = data.substring(0,data.indexOf('_')) || Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCheck;
            data = data.substring(data.indexOf('_') + 1);
            var updelem = jQuery(data);
            var numberOfUpdates = updelem.find('div[title]').length;
            if (numberOfUpdates > 0){
                store.importTiddlyWiki(data);
                Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCheck = serverTime;
                Emathbook.options.saveCourseSettings();
                autoSaveChanges();
                
            }
            if(typeof(callData) != "undefined" && callData != []){
                if(typeof(callData)=="object" && typeof(callData.length)=="number"){
                    if(callData.length == 0){return true;}
                    var originalTiddler = store.getTiddler(callData[callData.length-1].tiddlerName);
                } else {
                    var originalTiddler = store.getTiddler(callData.tiddlerName);
                }
                
                if(originalTiddler.isTagged('offlinesolution')){
                    var originalTitle = originalTiddler.title;
                    var solutionTiddlerName =Emathbook.options.pages[0].courseid+"_"+config.options.txtUserName+"_solution_";
                    var i=0;
                    while(store.tiddlerExists(solutionTiddlerName+i)){i++;}
                    solutionTiddlerName += i;
                    var solutionTiddler = store.createTiddler(solutionTiddlerName);
                    originalTiddler.tags.remove('offlinesolution')
                    solutionTiddler.set(solutionTiddlerName, originalTiddler.text, originalTiddler.modifier, originalTiddler.modified, originalTiddler.tags, originalTiddler.created, originalTiddler.fields, originalTiddler.creator);
                    store.removeTiddler(originalTiddler.title);
                    autoSaveChanges();
                    jQuery('#pageOne ul.solutiontablist [tiddler="'+originalTitle+'"]').attr('tiddler',solutionTiddlerName).find('a').click();
                    if(typeof(callData)=="object" && typeof(callData.length)=="number"){
                        callData[callData.length-1].tiddlerName= solutionTiddlerName;
                    } else {
                        callData.tiddlerName = solutionTiddlerName;
                    }
                }
                Emathbook.sendcourseContent(callData);
            }
        }
        if((typeof(callData) === "undefined" && jQuery('#bookclosedwindow').length > 0) || response.status != 200){
            saveChanges();
            jQuery('#bookclosedwindow').slideDown();
        }
    }
    var postdata = {
        'type' : 0,
        'courseid'  :  courseId,
        'username'  :  config.options.txtUserName,
        'userkey'   :  config.options.txtUserKey,
        'lastcheck' :  (Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCheck || 0)
    };
    
    //Fake response!!
    response={};
    setTimeout(function(){
        response.status=200;
        callback("");
        },100);
    //var response = jQuery.postCORS(Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].updateURL, postdata, callback);

}

Emathbook.getCourseSystemUpdate = function(){
    Emathbook.options.netconnection = true;
    var courseId = Emathbook.options.pages[0].courseid;
    
    callback = function(data){
        var loadscreen = jQuery('body #loadBookscreen');
        if (response.status == 200){
            var serverTime = data.substring(0,data.indexOf('_')) || Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCourseSyscheck;
            data = data.substring(data.indexOf('_') + 1);
            var updelem = jQuery(data);
            var numberOfUpdates = updelem.find('div[title]').length;
            
            if (numberOfUpdates > 0){
                var updateInfo = updelem.find('[updateinfo]');
                //store.importTiddlyWiki(data);
                //Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCourseSyscheck = serverTime;
                //Emathbook.options.saveCourseSettings();
                //autoSaveChanges();
                if(loadscreen.length == 0){
                    alert(numberOfUpdates+" updates done!\n Browser will be refeshed.");
                    refreshElements(jQuery('#pageOneWrapper')[0]);
                    setTimeout('window.location.reload()',1500);
                }else{
                    loadscreen.find('p.currentState').text(EbookDictionary.localize('system updates done'));
                    if(updateInfo.length > 0){
                        var updatehtml = "";
                        for(var i=0;i<updateInfo.length;i++){
                            var uppdateTiddlertitle = updateInfo.eq(i).attr('title');
                            updatehtml += '<<tiddler [['+updateInfo.eq(i).attr('title')+'##infolang_'+Emathbook.options.user.lang+']]>>\n';
                        }
                        loadscreen.find('p.currentState').append('<div id="updateinfo"><a id="updateinfobutton" href="javascript:;">Show update information</a><div style="display:none;" id="updateinformation"><p></p></div></div>');
                        loadscreen.find('#updateinfobutton').click(function(){
                            if(jQuery('#updateinformation').hasClass('ui-dialog-content')){
                                jQuery('#updateinformation').dialog("open");
                            }else{
                                var infoDialog = jQuery(this).parent().find('#updateinformation').dialog({
                                    modal: true,
                                    width:600,
                                    height:600,
                                    buttons: {
                                        Ok: function() {
                                            jQuery( this ).dialog( "close" );
                                        }
                                    }
                                });
                                wikify(updatehtml,infoDialog.find('p')[0],null,store.getTiddler(uppdateTiddlertitle));
                            }
                        });
                    }
                    loadscreen.dialog({ buttons: { "Ok": function() { loadscreen.find('p.currentState').text(EbookDictionary.localize('checking contentupdates'));
                    setTimeout("Emathbook.getCourseUpdates()",100); } } });
                }
            }else{
                if(loadscreen.length > 0){
                    loadscreen.find('p.currentState').text(EbookDictionary.localize('checking contentupdates'));
                    setTimeout("Emathbook.getCourseUpdates()",100);
                }
            }
        }else{
            Emathbook.options.netconnection = false;
            if(loadscreen.length > 0){
                loadscreen.find('p.currentState').text(EbookDictionary.localize('no internetconnection'));
                setTimeout("jQuery('body').find('#loadBookscreen').remove();",1000);
            }
        }
    }
    
    //Fake response!!
    response={};
    setTimeout(function(){
        response.status=200;
        callback('_<div id="storeArea"></div>');
        },100);
    //var response = jQuery.postCORS(Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].updateURL, {"type":10,"lastcheck":(Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCourseSyscheck || 0), "courseid": courseId, "username":config.options.txtUserName, "userkey":config.options.txtUserKey}, callback);
}

Emathbook.getCourseUpdates = function(){
    var courseId = Emathbook.options.pages[0].courseid;
    var extfiles = store.getTaggedTiddlers('ExternalTextFile');
    for (var i=0; i<extfiles.length; i++){
        var filepath = (extfiles[i].fields && extfiles[i].fields.filepath) || '';
        if (filepath !== ''){
            filepath = window.location.toString().replace(/[^\/]*.html/,'') + filepath;
            filepath = getLocalPath(filepath);
            saveFile(filepath, extfiles[i].text);
            switch (extfiles[i].fields.filetype){
                case 'javascript':
                    jQuery('body').append('<script type="text/javascript" src="'+extfiles[i].fields.filepath+'"></script>');
                    refreshElements(jQuery('#displayArea')[0], ['pageOne', 'pageTwo']);
                    break;
                case 'css':
                    jQuery('head').append('<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="'+extfiles[i].fields.filepath+'"></link>');
                    break;
                default:
                    break;
            }
            store.removeTiddler(extfiles[i].title);
        }
    }
    var callback = function(data){
        var loadscreen = jQuery('body #loadBookscreen');
        if (response.status == 200){
            var serverTime = data.substring(0,data.indexOf('_')) || Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCheck;
            data = data.substring(data.indexOf('_') + 1);
            
            var updelem = jQuery(data);
            var numberOfUpdates = updelem.find('div[title]').length;
            if (numberOfUpdates > 0){
                store.importTiddlyWiki(data);
                Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCheck = serverTime;
                Emathbook.options.saveCourseSettings();
                autoSaveChanges();
                if(loadscreen.length == 0){
                    alert(numberOfUpdates+" updates done!");
                    refreshElements(jQuery('#pageOneWrapper')[0]);
                }else{
                    loadscreen.find('p.currentState').text(EbookDictionary.localize('contentupdates done'));
                    loadscreen.dialog({ buttons: { "Ok": function() { setTimeout("jQuery('body').find('#loadBookscreen').remove();",1000); } } });
                }
            }else{
                if(loadscreen.length == 0){
                    alert("No updates available!");
                }else{
                    loadscreen.find('p.currentState').text(EbookDictionary.localize('no updates available'));
                    loadscreen.dialog({ buttons: { "Ok": function() { setTimeout("jQuery('body').find('#loadBookscreen').remove();",1000); } } });
                }
            }
        }else{
            Emathbook.options.netconnection = false;
            if(loadscreen.length > 0){
                loadscreen.find('p.currentState').text(EbookDictionary.localize('no internetconnection'));
                setTimeout("jQuery('body').find('#loadBookscreen').remove();",1000);
            }
        }
    }
    //Fake response!!
    response={};
    setTimeout(function(){
        response.status=200;
        callback("");
        },1000);
    //var response = jQuery.postCORS(Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].updateURL, {"type":0,"lastcheck":(Emathbook.options.courses[courseId].lastCheck || 0), "courseid": courseId, "username":config.options.txtUserName ,"userkey":config.options.txtUserKey}, callback);

}


//}}}






//{{{
/***************************************
* Last minute fix for basicassignments *
***************************************/
config.macros.showAssignment = {
    /**********************************************
     * Show listed assignments in three accordions by their level.
     **********************************************/
    handler: function (place, macroName, params, wikifier, paramString, tiddler)
    {
        // Function that gives solutions own to student / all to teacher
        var getSolutions = function(assignmentTitle,isTeacher){
            var goodsolutions = [];
            var possiblesolutions = store.reverseLookup('solutionto',assignmentTitle,true,'created');
            if(!isTeacher){
                for (var j=0;j<possiblesolutions.length;j++){
                    if (possiblesolutions[j].creator.toLowerCase() === config.options.txtUserName.toLowerCase()){
                        goodsolutions.push(possiblesolutions[j]);
                    }
                }
            }else{
                goodsolutions = possiblesolutions;
            }
            return goodsolutions;
        }
        
        // Function that gives information about solved solutions
        var getSolvers = function(assignmentType,solutionSet){
            var findsolver = {'assignmentsolvers':{},'hasSolutions':solutionSet.length > 0 ? true : false};
            for (var j=0;j<solutionSet.length;j++){
                if(!findsolver.assignmentsolvers[solutionSet[j].creator]){
                    findsolver.assignmentsolvers[solutionSet[j].creator] =[];
                }
                switch(parseInt(assignmentType))
                {
                    case 2:
                         findsolver.assignmentsolvers[solutionSet[j].creator].push(JSON.stringify(solutionSet[j].data()).match(/clicked/g).length - 1);
                    break;
                    case 3:
                         findsolver.assignmentsolvers[solutionSet[j].creator].push(solutionSet[j].data().solutionText||'');
                    break;
                    default:
                    break;
                }
            }
            return findsolver;
        }
        // Marks the accordion header if solution is solved (TODO: if has many sub-assignments)
        var refreshAssignment = function(){
            $tiddler.empty();
            wikify('<<showAssignment '+assignmentTiddler+'>>',$tiddler[0]);
        }
        // Marks the accordion header if solution is solved (TODO: if has many sub-assignments)
        var teacherAnswerbutton = function(placebefore){
            placebefore.after('<div class="teacherselection"><button class="teachershowsolution">'+EbookDictionary.localize('answer').substring(0,EbookDictionary.localize('answer').length-2)+'</button></div>');
                        $tiddler.find('button.teachershowsolution').click(function(){
                            placebefore.toggleClass('showsolutions');
                        });
        }
        // Gives students solutionlist to teacher
        var studenssolutionlist = function(assignmentTitle,options){
            if(typeof(options) ==="number"){options={'assignmentType':options};}
            if(typeof(Teachertool)!=="function") return false;
            var studentsolutions = getSolutions(assignmentTiddler,true);
            if(studentsolutions.length >0){
                $tiddler.find('div.teacherselection').append('<span class="showsolverbuttons showactive"><button class="teachershowsolvers">'+EbookDictionary.localize('show solvers')+'</button><button class="teacherhidesolvers">'+EbookDictionary.localize('hide solvers')+'</button></span><div class="solverInfo"></div>');
                $tiddler.find('button.teachershowsolvers').click(function(){
                    jQuery(this).parent().toggleClass('showactive');
                    var solvers = getSolvers(options.assignmentType,studentsolutions);
                    if ( solvers.hasSolutions ){
                        switch(parseInt(options.assignmentType))
                        {
                            case 2://multichoise returns solver and amount of wrong clicks
                                var maxwrong = assignmentData['wrong'].length;
                                var solverinfotable = $tiddler.find('.solverInfo').empty().append('<table>\n\t<tr>\n\t\t<th>'+EbookDictionary.localize('solver')+'</th><th>'+EbookDictionary.localize('wrong clicks')+'</th>\n\t</tr></table>').find('table');
                                var studentlist = Emathbook.options.courses[Emathbook.options.pages[0].courseid].students;
                                for (solver in solvers.assignmentsolvers){
                                    var uppercaseSolver = solver.replace(/\s+$/,'').toUpperCase();
                                    var wrongclicks = solvers.assignmentsolvers[solver][solvers.assignmentsolvers[solver].length-1];
                                    var solvername = (studentlist && studentlist[uppercaseSolver] && ((studentlist[uppercaseSolver].fname+studentlist[uppercaseSolver].lname) !==""))? studentlist[uppercaseSolver].fname + ' ' + studentlist[uppercaseSolver].lname : solver;
                                    solverinfotable.append('\t<tr>\n\t\t<td>'+solvername+'</td><td>'+wrongclicks+'/'+maxwrong+'</td>\n\t</tr>');
                                }
                            break;
                            case 3://shortanswer returns solver if correct is given otherwise solver and solution(s)
                                var correct_solution = assignmentTiddler 
                                var solverinfotable = $tiddler.find('.solverInfo').empty().append((options.hasCorrect?'<span>'+EbookDictionary.localize('correct solution')+': <span class="correctsolution">'+options.correct+'</span></span>':'')+'<table>\n\t<tr>\n\t\t<th>'+EbookDictionary.localize('solver')+'</th>'+(!options.hasCorrect?'<th>'+EbookDictionary.localize('solution')+'</th>':'')+'\n\t</tr></table>').find('table');
                                $tiddler.find('.solverInfo .correctsolution').mathquill();
                                var studentlist = Emathbook.options.courses[Emathbook.options.pages[0].courseid].students;
                                for (solver in solvers.assignmentsolvers){
                                    var uppercaseSolver = solver.replace(/\s+$/,'').toUpperCase();
                                    var solvername = (studentlist && studentlist[uppercaseSolver] && ((studentlist[uppercaseSolver].fname+studentlist[uppercaseSolver].lname) !==""))? studentlist[uppercaseSolver].fname + ' ' + studentlist[uppercaseSolver].lname : solver;
                                    if(options.hasCorrect){
                                        solverinfotable.append('\t<tr>\n\t\t<td>'+solvername+'</td>\n\t</tr>');
                                    }else{
                                        if(solvers.assignmentsolvers[solver].length ===1){
                                            solverinfotable.append('\t<tr>\n\t\t<td>'+solvername+'</td><td><span class="studentsanswer">'+solvers.assignmentsolvers[solver][solvers.assignmentsolvers[solver].length-1]+'</span></td>\n\t</tr>');
                                            solverinfotable.find('.studentsanswer').last().mathquill();
                                        }else{
                                            var solversolutionlist = solverinfotable.append('\t<tr>\n\t\t<td>'+solvername+'</td><td><ol class="shortanswerlist" solver="'+solver+'"></ol></td>\n\t</tr>').find('ol[solver="'+solver+'"]');
                                            for(var onesolution = 0; onesolution<solvers.assignmentsolvers[solver].length;onesolution++){
                                                solversolutionlist.append('<li><span class="studentsanswer">'+solvers.assignmentsolvers[solver][onesolution]+'</span></li>');
                                                solversolutionlist.find('.studentsanswer').last().mathquill();
                                            }
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            break;
                            case 5://SDshuffle returns solver
                                var correct_solution = assignmentTiddler;
                                var solverinfotable = $tiddler.find('.solverInfo').empty().append('<table>\n\t<tr>\n\t\t<th>'+EbookDictionary.localize('solver')+'</th>\n\t</tr></table>').find('table');
                                $tiddler.find('.solverInfo .correctsolution').mathquill();
                                var studentlist = Emathbook.options.courses[Emathbook.options.pages[0].courseid].students;
                                for (solver in solvers.assignmentsolvers){
                                    var uppercaseSolver = solver.replace(/\s+$/,'').toUpperCase();
                                    var solvername = (studentlist && studentlist[uppercaseSolver] && ((studentlist[uppercaseSolver].fname+studentlist[uppercaseSolver].lname) !==""))? studentlist[uppercaseSolver].fname + ' ' + studentlist[uppercaseSolver].lname : solver;
                                    solverinfotable.append('\t<tr>\n\t\t<td>'+solvername+'</td>\n\t</tr>');
                                }
                            default:
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                });
                
                $tiddler.find('button.teacherhidesolvers').click(function(){
                    jQuery(this).parent().toggleClass('showactive');
                    $tiddler.find('.solverInfo').empty();
                });
            }
        }
        // Marks the accordion header if solution is solved (TODO: if has many sub-assignments)
        var markSolved = function(givenAnswers,addIssolved){
            for(var location in givenAnswers){
                var answerLoc = $tiddler.find('[loc="'+location+'"]');
                if(answerLoc.children('span').hasClass('motivationstring')){

                    var answerLatex = answerLoc.children('span').find('span.mathquill-textbox').mathquill('latex');
                    answerLoc.children('span').find('span.mathquill-textbox').mathquill('revert');
                    answerLoc.children('span').empty();
                    wikify(answerLatex , answerLoc.children('span')[0]);
                }else{
                    answerLoc.children('span').mathquill('revert').text(givenAnswers[location]).mathquill();
                }
            }
            if(typeof(addIssolved) !=="undefined"){
                if(addIssolved ==="wrong"){
                    $tiddler.addClass('solvedwrong');
                }else{
                    $tiddler.addClass('issolved');
                }
            }
            $tiddler.find('.solution').css('background-color','none');
        }
        
        
        var markHeaderSolved = function(tiddlerplace){
            tiddlerplace.parents('.otherassignmentBasediv').parent().prev().find('a').append('<span class="multimark"><span class="multicorrect"><span>&#10003;</span></span></span>');
        }
        // Makes solution tiddler info available to teacher
        var markPublic = function(tiddlername){
            DataTiddler.setData(tiddlername,"solution",{'ispublic':true});
            Emathbook.sendOfflineCourseContent();
        }
        // Marks the solution tiddler so that it's back upped
        var markServerSend = function(tiddlername){
            if(typeof(tiddlername)==="string" && !store.tiddlerExists(tiddlername)){
                return false;
            }
            if(!tiddlername.isTagged){
                tiddlername = store.getTiddler(tiddlername);
            }
            if(!(lastSolution.isTagged('offlinesolution') || lastSolution.isTagged('backupthis'))){
                lastSolution.tags.push('backupthis');
                lastsolution.set();
            }
        }
        
        var $tiddler = jQuery(place);
        var pre_qustion_html="";
        var post_qustion_html="";
        var assignmentTiddler = params[0];
        var langinuse = "error";
        var pageId = $tiddler.parents('.bookpage').attr('id');
        switch(pageId){
            case "pageOne":
              var pageNro = 0;
              break;
            case "pageTwo":
              var pageNro = 1;
              break;
            default:
              var pageNro = 0;
              break;
        }

        if(Emathbook.options){
            if (Emathbook.options.pages[pageNro].lang != Emathbook.options.pages[pageNro]["defaultlang"]){
                if(store.tiddlerExists(params[0]+'_'+Emathbook.options.pages[pageNro].lang)){
                     //Tähän myös lang 
                    assignmentTiddler = params[0]+'_'+Emathbook.options.pages[pageNro].lang;
                    langinuse = Emathbook.options.pages[pageNro].lang;
                }else{
                    pre_qustion_html = '{{notTranslated{\n';
                    post_qustion_html = '\n}}}';
                    langinuse = Emathbook.options.pages[pageNro]["defaultlang"];                    
                }
            }else{
                langinuse = Emathbook.options.pages[pageNro].lang;
            }
        }
        
        if (store.tiddlerExists(assignmentTiddler)){
            var assignmentData = DataTiddler.getDataObject(assignmentTiddler);
            var assignmentType = assignmentData['assignmentType'];
            var qustion_html="";
            var isTeacher = (typeof(Teachertool) ==="function")? true:false;
            
            switch(parseInt(assignmentType))
            {
                case 0://"SD"-assignemnt
                    qustion_html="{{question_text sdquestion{<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>}}}";
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                    break;
                case 1://Just text nothing to do
                    qustion_html="{{question_text plaintext{<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>}}}";
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                    break;
                case 2://Multichoise
                    
                    qustion_html="{{question_text multichoise{<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>}}}";
                    var choises=[];
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                    $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"]').after('<ul class="multichoiseChoises multi'+assignmentTiddler+'"></ul>');
                    if(isTeacher){
                        choises.push('<li class="choise_1"><span class="multimark"><span class="multicorrect"><span>&#10003;</span></span></span><span class="choiseText"></span></li>');

                        for (var i=0;i<assignmentData['wrong'].length;i++){
                            choises.push('<li class="choise_'+(i+2)+'"><span class="multimark"><span class="multiwrong"><span>&#10007;</span></span></span><span class="choiseText"></span></li>');
                        }
                        var $multichoiseList = $tiddler.find('.multichoiseChoises.multi'+assignmentTiddler);
                        $multichoiseList.addClass('teacherbook');
                        choises.sort(function(a,b){return (Math.random()-0.5)});
                        choises.sort(function(a,b){return (Math.random()-0.5)});
                        for(var i=0;i<choises.length;i++){
                            $multichoiseList.append(choises[i]);
                        }
                        wikify(assignmentData['correct'],$multichoiseList.find('li.choise_1 span.choiseText')[0]);
                        for (var i=0;i<assignmentData['wrong'].length;i++){
                            wikify(assignmentData['wrong'][i],$multichoiseList.find('li.choise_'+(i+2)+' span.choiseText')[0]);
                        }
                        teacherAnswerbutton($multichoiseList);
                        studenssolutionlist(assignmentTiddler,2);

                    }else{
                        var solutions = getSolutions(assignmentTiddler,isTeacher);
                        var lastSolution = ((solutions.length > 0)? solutions[solutions.length-1] : false);
                        if (lastSolution){
                            var clicked=DataTiddler.getDataObject(lastSolution);
                        }else{
                            var clicked={};
                        }
                    
                        choises.push('<li class="choise_1"><span class="multimark">'+((typeof(clicked['choise_1'])=='undefined') ? '<input type="radio" name="'+assignmentTiddler+'" value="choise_1">' : '<span class="multicorrect"><span>&#10003;</span></span>')+'</span><span class="choiseText"></span></li>');

                        for (var i=0;i<assignmentData['wrong'].length;i++){
                            choises.push('<li class="choise_'+(i+2)+'"><span class="multimark">'+((typeof(clicked['choise_'+(i+2)])=='undefined') ? '<input type="radio" name="'+assignmentTiddler+'" value="choise_'+(i+2)+'">':'<span class="multiwrong"><span>&#10007;</span></span>')+'</span><span class="choiseText"></span></li>');
                        }
                        var $multichoiseList = $tiddler.find('.multichoiseChoises.multi'+assignmentTiddler);
                        choises.sort(function(a,b){return (Math.random()-0.5)});
                        choises.sort(function(a,b){return (Math.random()-0.5)});
                        for(var i=0;i<choises.length;i++){
                            $multichoiseList.append(choises[i]);
                        }
                        wikify(assignmentData['correct'],$multichoiseList.find('li.choise_1 span.choiseText')[0]);
                        if(typeof(clicked['choise_1'])!=='undefined'){
                            $multichoiseList.addClass('solved');
                            //markHeaderSolved($tiddler);
                        }
                        for (var i=0;i<assignmentData['wrong'].length;i++){
                            wikify(assignmentData['wrong'][i],$multichoiseList.find('li.choise_'+(i+2)+' span.choiseText')[0]);
                        }
                        if (!$multichoiseList.hasClass('solved')){
                            $multichoiseList.find('input[type="radio"]').click(function(){
                                var $inputElem = jQuery(this);
                                if (!lastSolution){
                                    lastSolution = store.getTiddler(Emathbook.createSolution(assignmentTiddler,""));
                                }
                                var autosaveoption = config.options.chkAutoSave;
                                config.options.chkAutoSave = false;
                                DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,$inputElem.val(),"clicked");
                                if($inputElem.val()=='choise_1'){
                                    $inputElem.after('<span class="multicorrect"><span>&#10003;</span></span>');
                                    $multichoiseList.addClass('solved');
                                    DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,"multichoise","solved");
                                    markPublic(lastSolution);
                                }else{
                                    $inputElem.after('<span class="multiwrong"><span>&#10007;</span></span>');
                                }
                                markServerSend(lastSolution);
                                $inputElem.remove();
                                config.options.chkAutoSave = autosaveoption;
                            });
                        }
                    }
                    break;
                case 3://Shortanswer
                    var solutions = getSolutions(assignmentTiddler,isTeacher);
                    var lastSolution = ((solutions.length > 0)? solutions[solutions.length-1] : false);
                    qustion_html = "{{question_text shortanswer{<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>}}}";
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                    $tiddler.find('.mathquill-embedded-latex.mathquill-rendered-math').attr('title','');
                    var latexString = $tiddler.find('.mathquill-embedded-latex.mathquill-rendered-math').mathquill('latex');
                    if(isTeacher){
                        var editables = $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] span.solution .mathquill-editable');
                        var correctAnswers = DataTiddler.getData(assignmentTiddler,"correct","");
                        $tiddler.find('.shortanswer').addClass('teacherbook');
                        var correctSolution = "";
                        if(!!correctAnswers){
                            for(var i=0;i<editables.length;i++){
                                if (!!correctAnswers[i] && correctAnswers[i] != ""){
                                    latexString = latexString.replace('\\solution{ }'," "+correctAnswers[i]+" ");
                                }
                            }
                            $tiddler.find('.shortanswer').append('<div class="correctSortanswer"><span></span></div>').find('.correctSortanswer span').text(latexString).mathquill();
                            teacherAnswerbutton($tiddler.find('.shortanswer'));
                        } else{
                           $tiddler.find('.shortanswer').after('<div class="teacherselection"></div>');
                        }
                        $tiddler.find('.shortanswer').addClass('teacherbook');
                        studenssolutionlist(assignmentTiddler,{"assignmentType":3,"hasCorrect":!!correctAnswers ,"correct":latexString});
                        
                    }else{
                        
                        var isSolved = 'not';
                        var editables = $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] span.solution .mathquill-editable');
                        var answers = [];
                        var correctAnswers = DataTiddler.getData(assignmentTiddler,"correct","");
                        if(lastSolution){
                            isSolved = DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,'solved','not');
                            answers = DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,'answers',[]);
                        }else{
                            for(var i=0;i<editables.length;i++){
                                answers.push("");
                            }
                        }
                        for(var i=0;i<editables.length;i++){
                            if (answers[i] != ""){
                                editables.eq(i).mathquill('latex',answers[i]);
                                latexString = latexString.replace('\\solution{ }',"\\solution{"+answers[i]+"}");
                            }
                        }
                        if (isSolved == "solved"){
                            $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] > span.mathquill-embedded-latex').mathquill('revert').text(latexString).mathquill();
                            $tiddler.append('<span class="shortanswercorrect"><span>&#10003;</span></span>');
                        }else{
                            // var hasButton = false;
                            editables.focusout(function(){
                                
                                if(!lastSolution){
                                    lastSolution = store.getTiddler(Emathbook.createSolution(assignmentTiddler,""));
                                }
                                var autosaveoption = config.options.chkAutoSave;
                                config.options.chkAutoSave = false;
                                var thisElement = jQuery(this);
                                answers[editables.index(thisElement)]=thisElement.mathquill('latex');
                                DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'answers',answers);
                                if(!!answers && !!correctAnswers && !(answers<correctAnswers || correctAnswers<answers)){
                                    DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'solved','solved');
                                    markPublic(lastSolution);
                                    refreshAssignment();
                                }
                                config.options.chkAutoSave = autosaveoption;
                            });
                            if( !correctAnswers){
                                if(lastSolution && DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,'sended','') ==="sended"){
                                    $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] > span.mathquill-embedded-latex').mathquill('revert').text(latexString).mathquill();
                                    $tiddler.append('<span class="shortanswersend"><button class="ebook-button" title="'+EbookDictionary.localize('newsolution')+'"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1" width="30" height="30" viewbox="0 0 30 30" class="mini-icon-newitem"><path style="stroke: none; fill: white;" d="M7 4 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m7 9 l4 0 l0 4 l4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l4 0z" /><path style="stroke: none;" d="M6 3 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m7 9 l4 0 l0 4 l4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l4 0z" /></svg></button></span>').find('.shortanswersend button').click(function(){
                                        Emathbook.createSolution(assignmentTiddler,"");
                                        refreshAssignment();
                                    });
                                }else{
                                    $tiddler.append('<span class="shortanswersend"><button class="ebook-button" title="'+EbookDictionary.localize('send')+'"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1" width="20" height="20" viewbox="0 0 30 30" class="mini-icon mini-icon-publish"><path style="stroke: none;" d="M1 3 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m12 0 l0 6 l6 0z m-6 10 a30 30 0 0 0 15 0 l0 -4 l7 7 l-7 7 l0 -5 a30 30 0 0 1 -15 2z" /></svg></button></span>').find('.shortanswersend button').click(function(){
                                        if(!lastSolution){
                                            return false;
                                        }
                                        var autosaveoption = config.options.chkAutoSave;
                                        config.options.chkAutoSave = false;
                                        var sendButton = jQuery(this);
                                        DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'solutionText',$tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] > span.mathquill-embedded-latex').mathquill('latex'));
                                        DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'sended','sended');
                                        config.options.chkAutoSave = autosaveoption;
                                        markPublic(lastSolution);
                                        refreshAssignment();
                                        });
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    break;
                case 5://Order SD
                    var solutions = getSolutions(assignmentTiddler,isTeacher);
                    var lastSolution = ((solutions.length > 0)? solutions[solutions.length-1] : false);
                    qustion_html="!"+ EbookDictionary.localize('ordersd',pageNro)+"\n{{question_text sdshuffle{<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>}}}";
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                    
                    if(lastSolution && !isTeacher){
                        $tiddler.addClass('sdInOrder');
                    }else{
                        var tableRows = $tiddler.find('.sdtable tr');
                        for (var i=0;i<tableRows.length;i++){
                            tableRows.eq(i).attr('order',i);
                        }
                        var allDerivations = $tiddler.find('.sdtable').children('tbody');
                        allDerivations.addClass(assignmentTiddler+'shuffle');
                        for(var i=0;i<allDerivations.length;i++){
                            allDerivations.eq(i).children('tr').shuffle();
                            if(!isTeacher){
                                allDerivations.eq(i).sortable().disableSelection();
                            }
                        }
                        if(!isTeacher){
                            $tiddler.find('.'+assignmentTiddler+'shuffle').bind( "sortupdate", function(event, ui) {
                                tableRows = $tiddler.find('.sdtable tr');
                                for(var i=0;i<tableRows.length;i++){
                                    if(tableRows.eq(i).attr('order') != i){break};
                                    if(i==tableRows.length-1){
                                        $tiddler.find('.'+assignmentTiddler+'shuffle').sortable('destroy');
                                        $tiddler.addClass('sdInOrder');
                                        lastSolution=Emathbook.createSolution(assignmentTiddler,"");
                                        var autosaveoption = config.options.chkAutoSave;
                                        config.options.chkAutoSave = false;
                                        DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'solved','solved');
                                        markPublic(lastSolution);
                                        config.options.chkAutoSave = autosaveoption;
                                    }
                                }
                            });
                        }else{
                            teacherAnswerbutton($tiddler.find('.sdshuffle'));
                            wikify("<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>",$tiddler.find('.sdshuffle').append('<div class="correctShuffleSD"></div>').find('.correctShuffleSD')[0]);
                            $tiddler.find('.sdshuffle .correctShuffleSD').addClass('hidecorrectShuffleSD');
                            studenssolutionlist(assignmentTiddler,5);
                        }
                    }
                    
                    break;
                case 6://Fill something in SD
                    var solutions = getSolutions(assignmentTiddler,isTeacher);
                    var lastSolution = ((solutions.length > 0)? solutions[solutions.length-1] : false);
                    qustion_html="!"+ EbookDictionary.localize('fillsd',pageNro)+"\n{{question_text sdfill{<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>}}}";
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                    var fillMotivations = $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] table.sdtable td.motivation span.solution').addClass('fillMot').mathquill('textbox');
                    var fillTerms = $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] table.sdtable td.term span.solution').addClass('fillTerm').mathquill('editable');
                    var fillRelations = $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] table.sdtable td.relation span.solution').addClass('fillRelation').mathquill('editable');
                    var isSolved = 'not';
                    var editables = jQuery.merge(fillMotivations,fillTerms);
                    editables = jQuery.merge(editables,fillRelations);
                    var answers = [];
                    var correctAnswers = DataTiddler.getData(assignmentTiddler,"correct","");
                    var givenAnswers = {};
                    if(lastSolution && !isTeacher){
                        isSolved = DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,'solved','not');
                        answers = DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,'answers',[]);
                    }
                    if(answers.length ===0){
                        for(var i=0;i<editables.length;i++){
                            answers.push("");
                        }
                    }
                    for(var i=0;i<editables.length;i++){
                        
                        var thisSDloc = editables.eq(i).parents('[loc]').eq(0);
                        if(editables.eq(i).hasClass('fillMot')){
                            givenAnswers[thisSDloc.attr('loc')] = typeof(givenAnswers[thisSDloc.attr('loc')]) ==="undefined" ? thisSDloc.find('span.motivationstring > span').mathquill('latex').replace('\\solution{ }',"\\solution{"+answers[i]+"}") : givenAnswers[thisSDloc.attr('loc')].replace('\\solution{ }',"\\solution{"+answers[i]+"}");
                        }else{
                            givenAnswers[thisSDloc.attr('loc')] = typeof(givenAnswers[thisSDloc.attr('loc')]) ==="undefined" ? thisSDloc.find('>span').mathquill('latex').replace('\\solution{ }',"\\solution{"+answers[i]+"}") : givenAnswers[thisSDloc.attr('loc')].replace('\\solution{ }',"\\solution{"+answers[i]+"}");
                        }
                        if (answers[i] != ""){
                            editables.eq(i).mathquill('latex',answers[i]);
                            if(editables.eq(i).hasClass('fillMot')){editables.eq(i).blur();}
                        }
                    }
                    if( !isTeacher){
                        if (isSolved == "solved" ){
                            markSolved(givenAnswers ,"correct");
                        }else{
                            editables.focusout(function(){                         
                                var autosaveoption = config.options.chkAutoSave;
                                config.options.chkAutoSave = false;
                                if(!lastSolution){
                                    lastSolution = store.getTiddler(Emathbook.createSolution(assignmentTiddler,""));
                                }
                                var thisElement = jQuery(this);
                                answers[editables.index(thisElement)]=thisElement.mathquill('latex');   
                                DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'answers',answers);
                                if(!!answers && !!correctAnswers && !(answers<correctAnswers || correctAnswers<answers)){
                                    DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'solved','solved');
                                    markPublic(lastSolution);
                                    $tiddler.addClass('issolved');
                                    editables.removeClass('mathquill-editable');
                                    editables.unbind('focusout');
                                }
                                config.options.chkAutoSave = autosaveoption;
                            });
                        }
                        if( typeof(correctAnswers.length) ==="number" && correctAnswers.length ===0 ){
                                if(lastSolution && DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,'sended','') ==="sended"){
                                    //$tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] > span.mathquill-embedded-latex').mathquill('revert').text(latexString).mathquill();
                                    markSolved(givenAnswers,DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,"teachercorrect",undefined));
                                    $tiddler.find('.question_text.sdfill').after('<span class="shortanswersend"><button class="ebook-button" title="'+EbookDictionary.localize('newsolution')+'"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1" width="30" height="30" viewbox="0 0 30 30" class="mini-icon-newitem"><path style="stroke: none; fill: white;" d="M7 4 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m7 9 l4 0 l0 4 l4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l4 0z" /><path style="stroke: none;" d="M6 3 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m7 9 l4 0 l0 4 l4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l4 0z" /></svg></button></span>').before('<span class="shortanswersend"><button class="ebook-button" title="'+EbookDictionary.localize('newsolution')+'"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1" width="30" height="30" viewbox="0 0 30 30" class="mini-icon-newitem"><path style="stroke: none; fill: white;" d="M7 4 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m7 9 l4 0 l0 4 l4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l4 0z" /><path style="stroke: none;" d="M6 3 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m7 9 l4 0 l0 4 l4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l-4 0 l0 -4 l4 0z" /></svg></button></span>').parent().find('.shortanswersend button').click(function(){
                                        Emathbook.createSolution(assignmentTiddler,"");
                                        refreshAssignment();
                                    });
                                }else{
                                    $tiddler.find('.question_text.sdfill').after('<span class="shortanswersend"><button class="ebook-button" title="'+EbookDictionary.localize('send')+'"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1" width="20" height="20" viewbox="0 0 30 30" class="mini-icon mini-icon-publish"><path style="stroke: none;" d="M1 3 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m12 0 l0 6 l6 0z m-6 10 a30 30 0 0 0 15 0 l0 -4 l7 7 l-7 7 l0 -5 a30 30 0 0 1 -15 2z" /></svg></button></span>').before('<span class="shortanswersend"><button class="ebook-button" title="'+EbookDictionary.localize('send')+'"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" version="1.1" width="20" height="20" viewbox="0 0 30 30" class="mini-icon mini-icon-publish"><path style="stroke: none;" d="M1 3 l13 0 l7 7 l0 18 l-20 0 z m1 1 l0 23 l18 0 l0 -16 l-7 0 l0 -7 z m12 0 l0 6 l6 0z m-6 10 a30 30 0 0 0 15 0 l0 -4 l7 7 l-7 7 l0 -5 a30 30 0 0 1 -15 2z" /></svg></button></span>').parent().find('.shortanswersend button').click(function(){
                                        if(!lastSolution){
                                            return false;
                                        }
                                        var autosaveoption = config.options.chkAutoSave;
                                        config.options.chkAutoSave = false;
                                        //var sendButton = jQuery(this);
                                        //DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'solutionText',$tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] > span.mathquill-embedded-latex').mathquill('latex'));
                                        DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'sended','sended');
                                        config.options.chkAutoSave = autosaveoption;
                                        markPublic(lastSolution);
                                        refreshAssignment();
                                        });
                                }
                            }
                    }else{
                        editables.removeClass('mathquill-editable').addClass('teacherpreview');
                    }
                break;
                case 7://Filltable
                    var solutions = getSolutions(assignmentTiddler,isTeacher);
                    var lastSolution = ((solutions.length > 0)? solutions[solutions.length-1] : false);
                    var questionTitle = store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler).fields.ebooktitle;
                    qustion_html="!"+((typeof(questionTitle) != "undefined" && questionTitle != "")? questionTitle : EbookDictionary.localize('tablefill',pageNro))+"\n{{question_text tablefill{<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>}}}";//Localization for header!!
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                     $tiddler.find('.mathquill-embedded-latex.mathquill-rendered-math').attr('title','');
                    var isSolved = 'not';
                    var editables = $tiddler.find('[tiddler="'+assignmentTiddler+'"] span.solution .mathquill-editable');
                    var answers = [];
                    var correctAnswers = DataTiddler.getData(assignmentTiddler,"correct","");
                    if(lastSolution){
                        isSolved = DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,'solved','not');
                        answers = DataTiddler.getData(lastSolution,'answers',[]);
                    }else{
                        for(var i=0;i<editables.length;i++){
                            answers.push("");
                        }
                    }
                    for(var i=0;i<editables.length;i++){
                        if (answers[i] != ""){
                            editables.eq(i).mathquill('latex',answers[i]);
                        }
                    }
                    if (isSolved == "solved"){
                        editables.removeClass('mathquill-editable');
                        $tiddler.addClass('issolved');
                    }else{
                        editables.focusout(function(){
                            if(!lastSolution){
                                lastSolution = store.getTiddler(Emathbook.createSolution(assignmentTiddler,""));
                            }
                            var autosaveoption = config.options.chkAutoSave;
                            config.options.chkAutoSave = false;
                            var thisElement = jQuery(this);
                            answers[editables.index(thisElement)]=thisElement.mathquill('latex');
                            DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'answers',answers);
                            if(!!answers && !!correctAnswers && !(answers<correctAnswers || correctAnswers<answers)){
                                DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'solved','solved');
                                editables.removeClass('mathquill-editable');
                                $tiddler.addClass('issolved');
                                editables.unbind('focusout');
                            }
                            config.options.chkAutoSave = autosaveoption;
                        });
                    }
                break;
                case 8://Interactive Quiz
                    var solutions = getSolutions(assignmentTiddler,isTeacher);
                    var lastSolution = ((solutions.length > 0)? solutions[solutions.length-1] : false);
                    if (lastSolution){
                        var quizSolution=DataTiddler.getDataObject(lastSolution);
                    }else{
                        var quizSolution={};
                    }
                    if(!quizSolution.save){
                        quizSolution.save={};
                        quizSolution.save.correct=0;
                        quizSolution.save.total=0;
                    }
                    qustion_html="{{question_text emathQuizassignment{<<emathquiz [["+assignmentData['openQuiz']+"##"+langinuse+"]] [["+quizSolution.save.correct+"##"+quizSolution.save.total+"]] [["+assignmentData['callFunction'].join(']] [[')+"]]>>}}}";
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                    jQuery(place).find('.emathQuizassignment').attr('tiddler',assignmentTiddler);
                    jQuery(place).find('.emathquiz-place').bind('changed', function(e){
                        if(!lastSolution){
                            lastSolution = store.getTiddler(Emathbook.createSolution(assignmentTiddler,""));
                        }
                        var autosaveoption = config.options.chkAutoSave;
                        config.options.chkAutoSave = false;
                        var save = jQuery(this).emathquiz('score');
                        DataTiddler.setData(lastSolution,'save',save);
                        config.options.chkAutoSave = autosaveoption;
                    });
                break;
                default:
                    qustion_html="{{question_text notTypedquestion{<<tiddler [["+assignmentTiddler+"]]>>}}}";
                    wikify(pre_qustion_html + qustion_html + post_qustion_html,$tiddler.get(0),false,store.getTiddler(assignmentTiddler));
                    break;
            }
            
        }
        
    }
}
//}}}
